ada ejapaye pakshikayan asarana wela,me naduwata ena minissunta the koppayak aran denna kenek naha.mangala samarawira amathiwaraya naduwata awith wahanaye nagala maru wenawa.ee nisa ada ejapaye pakshikayanta wagakiyanna kenek naha.ada ejapaye hitapu maha lekam thissa aththanayaka mathithumath me naduwa balanna aawa.ethumath pahadiliwa prakasha kara madhyata me naduwa wisandaganna nayakayanta madihath wenna kiyala.ada naduwata hata ganak innawa,ko me minissunta rakawaranayak,boruwata janapriya wennath thamange nayakathwaya rakagannath karapu wada nisa ada ejapa pakshikaya billata dila”

ee chithrapataye ena kawi gayana kala pandith amaradewayanta saha nanda maliniyata 1980 janadhipathi sammana ulele hondama gayakaya saha gayikawata himiwana sammana labuna.me imihiri kawi gayanayata asuda sita pembanda mata ee kawi tika ayithi karagannata kramayak eda thibune na.pasukalinawa prawruththi departhamenthuwe sewaye yededdi rajaye chithrapata anshaye me chithrapataya thibuna nisa ehi sewaya kala pradarshaka mithurekuta pinsendu wi kawi gayanawa kasat patayakata kopi karagannata hakiwuna.me postuwa liyaddi sahrudayek wisin yu batayata athulath kara thibu ee kawi pele mul gayanaya hamuwima mage bhagyayak.kawi pela rasa windimin kiyawamu.
